describe: Jordan is a country located in the Middle East, known for its rich history, diverse landscapes, and cultural heritage. It is home to ancient monuments, nature reserves, and seaside resorts. The country is renowned for its hospitality and is a major tourist destination in the region.

cities.name: 🏙 Amman
cities.geographical_location: Located in the north-central part of Jordan, Amman is the capital and largest city of the country.
cities.climate: Amman has a semi-arid climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Mansaf, a traditional Jordanian dish made of lamb cooked in a sauce of fermented dried yogurt and served with rice.

cities.name: 🏙 Petra
cities.geographical_location: Situated in southern Jordan, Petra is an archaeological city famous for its rock-cut architecture.
cities.climate: Petra has a desert climate with hot summers and cool winters, with occasional rain.
cities.famous_cuisine: Zarb, a traditional Bedouin dish cooked underground with meat and vegetables.

cities.name: 🏝 Aqaba
cities.geographical_location: Located at the northeastern tip of the Red Sea, Aqaba is Jordan's only coastal city.
cities.climate: Aqaba has a hot desert climate with warm winters and extremely hot summers.
cities.famous_cuisine: Sayadieh, a seafood dish made with fish, rice, and spices.
